words.translation: The Inevitable Reality!

translations.15: The Inevitable Hour

words.translation: What|(is) the Inevitable Reality

translations.15: What is the Inevitable Hour

words.translation: And what|will make you know|what|(is) the Inevitable Reality

translations.15: And what will make you realize what the Inevitable Hour is

words.translation: Denied|Thamud|and Aad|the Striking Calamity

translations.15: ˹Both˺ Thamûd and ’Ȃd denied the Striking Disaster

words.translation: So as for|Thamud|they were destroyed|by the overpowering (blast)

translations.15: As for Thamûd, they were destroyed by an overwhelming blast

words.translation: And as for|Aad|they were destroyed|by a wind|screaming|violent

translations.15: And as for ’Ȃd, they were destroyed by a furious, bitter wind

words.translation: Which He imposed|upon them|(for) seven|nights|and eight|days|(in) succession|so you would see|the people|therein|fallen|as if they were|trunks|(of) date-palms|hollow

translations.1: Sakkhara-haa 'alaihim sab'a la-yaalinw Wa-samaaniyata ayyaamin husooman fataral qawma feehaa sar'aa ka-annahum a'jaazu nakhlin khaawiyah
translations.15: which Allah unleashed on them non-stop for seven nights and eight days, so that you would have seen its people lying dead like trunks of uprooted palm trees

words.translation: Then do|you see|of them|any|remains

translations.15: Do you see any of them left alive

words.translation: And came|Firaun|and (those)|before him|and the overturned cities|with sin

translations.1: Wa-jaaa'a Firawnu Wa-man qablahoo wal-mu'tafikaatu bil-khaati'ah
translations.15: Also, Pharaoh and those before him, and ˹the people of˺ the overturned cities ˹of Lot˺ indulged in sin

words.translation: And they disobeyed|(the) Messenger|(of) their Lord|so He seized them|(with) a seizure|exceeding

translations.1: Fa'asaw Rasoola Rabbihim fa-akhazahum akhzatar raabiyah
translations.15: each disobeying their Lord’s messenger, so He seized them with a crushing grip

words.translation: Indeed We|when|overflowed|the water|We carried you|in|the sailing (ship)

translations.1: Innaa lammaa taghal maaa'u hamalnaakum fil jaariyah
translations.15: Indeed, when the floodwater had overflowed, We carried you in the floating Ark ˹with Noah˺

words.translation: That We might make it|for you|a reminder|and would be conscious of it|an ear|conscious

translations.1: Li-naj'alahaa lakum tazki-ratanw-wa ta'iyahaa uzununw waa'iyah
translations.15: so that We may make this a reminder to you, and that attentive ears may grasp it

words.translation: Then when|is blown|in|the trumpet|a blast|single

translations.1: Fa-izaa nufikha fis soori nafkhatunw waahidah
translations.15: At last, when the Trumpet will be blown with one blast

words.translation: And are lifted|the earth|and the mountains|and crushed|(with) a crushing|single

translations.1: Wa-humilatil ardu wal-jibaalu fadukkataa dakkatanw waahidah
translations.15: and the earth and mountains will be lifted up and crushed with one blow

words.translation: Then (on) that Day|will occur|the Occurrence

translations.15: on that Day the Inevitable Event will have come to pass

words.translation: And will split|the heaven|so it|(is on) that Day|frail

translations.15: The sky will then be so torn that it will be frail

words.translation: And the Angels|(will be) on|its edges|and will bear|(the) Throne|(of) your Lord|above them|that Day|eight

translations.1: Wal-malaku 'alaaa arjaaa'ihaa; Wa-yahmilu 'Arsha Rabbika fawqahum yawma'izin samaaniyah
translations.15: with the angels on its sides. On that Day eight ˹mighty angels˺ will bear the Throne of your Lord above them

words.translation: That Day|you will be exhibited|not|will be hidden|among you|any secret

translations.1: Yawma'izin tu'radoona laa takhfaa min-kum khaafiyah
translations.15: You will then be presented ˹before Him for judgment˺, and none of your secrets will stay hidden

words.translation: Then as for|(him) who|is given|his record|in his right hand|will say|Here|read|my record!

translations.1: Fa-ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo biyameenihee fa-yaqoolu haaa'umuq ra'oo kitaabiyah
translations.15: As for those given their records in their right hand, they will cry ˹happily˺, “Here ˹everyone˺! Read my record

words.translation: Indeed I|was certain|that I|(will) meet|my account

translations.15: I surely knew I would face my reckoning.”

words.translation: So he|(will be) in|a life|pleasant

translations.15: They will be in a life of bliss

words.translation: In|a Garden|elevated

translations.15: in an elevated Garden

words.translation: Its clusters of fruits|hanging near

translations.15: whose fruit will hang within reach

words.translation: Eat|and drink|(in) satisfaction|for what|you sent before you|in|the days|past

translations.1: Kuloo washraboo haneee'am bimaaa aslaftum fil ayyaamil khaliyah
translations.15: ˹They will be told,˺ “Eat and drink joyfully for what you did in the days gone by.”

words.translation: But as for|(him) who|is given|his record|in his left hand|will say|O! I wish|not|I had been given|my record

translations.1: Wa-ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo bishimaalihee fa-yaqoolu yaalaitanee lam oota kitaaabiyah
translations.15: And as for those given their record in their left hand, they will cry ˹bitterly˺, “I wish I had not been given my record

words.translation: And not|I had known|what|(is) my account

translations.15: nor known anything of my reckoning

words.translation: O! I wish it|had been|the end

translations.15: I wish death was the end

words.translation: Not|has availed|me|my wealth

translations.15: My wealth has not benefited me

words.translation: Is gone|from me|my authority

translations.15: My authority has been stripped from me.”

words.translation: Seize him|and shackle him

translations.15: ˹It will be said,˺ “Seize and shackle them

words.translation: Then|(into) the Hellfire|burn him

translations.15: then burn them in Hell

words.translation: Then|into|a chain|its length|(is) seventy|cubits|insert him

translations.1: Summa fee silsilatin zar'uhaa sab'oona ziraa'an faslukooh
translations.15: then tie them up with chains seventy arms long

words.translation: Indeed, he|(did)|not|believe|in Allah|the Most Great

translations.15: For they never had faith in Allah, the Greatest

words.translation: And (did) not|feel the urge|on|(the) feeding|(of) the poor

translations.15: nor encouraged the feeding of the poor

words.translation: So not|for him|today|here|any devoted friend

translations.15: So this Day they will have no close friend here

words.translation: And not|any food|except|from|(the) discharge of wounds

translations.15: nor any food except ˹oozing˺ pus

words.translation: Not|will eat it|except|the sinners

translations.15: which none will eat except the evildoers.”

words.translation: But nay!|I swear|by what|you see

translations.15: Now, I do swear by whatever you see

words.translation: And what|not|you see

translations.15: and whatever you cannot see

words.translation: Indeed it (is)|surely (the) Word|(of) a Messenger|noble

translations.15: Indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is the recitation of a noble Messenger

words.translation: And not|it|(is the) word|(of) a poet;|little|(is) what|you believe!

translations.1: Wa-maa huwa biqawli shaa'ir; qaleelan maa tu'minoon
translations.15: It is not the prose of a poet ˹as you claim˺, ˹yet˺ you hardly have any faith

words.translation: And not|(it is the) word|(of) a soothsayer;|little|(is) what|you remember

translations.1: Wa-laa biqawli kaahin; qaleelan maa tazakkaroon
translations.15: Nor is it the mumbling of a fortune-teller, ˹yet˺ you are hardly mindful

words.translation: (It is) a revelation|from|(the) Lord|(of) the worlds

translations.15: ˹It is˺ a revelation from the Lord of all worlds

words.translation: And if|he (had) fabricated|against Us|some|sayings

translations.15: Had the Messenger made up something in Our Name

words.translation: Certainly We (would) have seized|him|by the right hand;

translations.15: We would have certainly seized him by his right hand

words.translation: Then|certainly We (would) have cut off|from him|the aorta

translations.15: then severed his aorta

words.translation: And not|from you|any|one|[from him]|(could) prevent

translations.15: and none of you could have shielded him ˹from Us˺

words.translation: And indeed it|(is) surely a reminder|for the Allah-fearing

translations.15: Indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is a reminder to those mindful ˹of Allah˺

words.translation: And indeed We|surely know|that|among you|(are) deniers

translations.15: And We certainly know that some of you will persist in denial

words.translation: And indeed it|(is) surely a regret|upon|the disbelievers

translations.15: and it will surely be a source of regret for the disbelievers

words.translation: And indeed it (is)|surely (the) truth|(of) certainty

translations.15: And indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is the absolute truth

words.translation: So glorify|(the) name|(of) your Lord|the Most Great

translations.15: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Greatest
